title: Introduction to Web Development
excerpt: Learn the basics of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
content:
Web development is the process of building websites and web applications. It involves three main technologies:

  • HTML for structure
  • CSS for styling
  • JavaScript for interactivity

Start with understanding the basic HTML elements and gradually progress to more complex concepts like CSS Grid and JavaScript frameworks.

title: Responsive Design Techniques
excerpt: Master responsive web design with modern CSS techniques.
content:
Responsive design ensures your website looks great on all devices. Key techniques include:

  • Media queries
  • Flexbox layouts
  • CSS Grid
  • Fluid typography

Remember to test your designs on multiple screen sizes and use relative units like percentages and rems.
